text.section:
Subject to any regulations the Commissioner adopts in connection with the transition to the nationwide licensing system, an initial license term shall:
Begin on the day the license is issued; and
Expire on December 31 of the year:
The license is issued, if the license is issued before November 1; or
Succeeding the year that the license is issued, if the license is issued on or after November 1.

In addition to the license renewal fee required under subsection (b)(3) of this section, an applicant for a license renewal shall pay to the nationwide licensing system the fee that the nationwide licensing system imposes in connection with the renewal application.
